alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 6:28PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cochise County through 715 PM MST... At 628 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Willcox, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly remote areas of north central Cochise County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 326 and 337. Route 191 near mile marker 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
